Nighlight:

=E2=80=9CI could shoot energy balls from my hands... Just that=
=E2=80=9Dwhispered the femme and she added=E2=80=9CI was captured by predac=
ons two times, couting the last one and reprogramed. In the first one I was=
 involved in the defence of the base... I wasnt the most skilled cause I wa=
s captured again while I was defending it. =E2=80=9Dthen she added =E2=80=
=9CLet=E2=80=99s do this...=E2=80=9D




From: Sandy Panico 
Sent: Thursday=
, July 28, 2011 8:24 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: MEdic Bay
=




Nightshift listens thoughtfully.  Being a Pretender himself, he too was=
 vexed between factions as he would often have to fight against his own fac=
tion when in the company of Decepticon forces.  He could feel her pain and =
flashes his parking lights in response.  

" I sure know where you're comm'=
n from.  Way back when, when the cons didn't know my true faction, I'd have=
 ta take out my bot buddies when I was supposedly in the company of Decepti=
con forces, just so that I didn't get suspected of treason.  Slag was that =
a nail in my tires.  I hated every minute of  those battles.  And what was =
worse, the times when the cons won their battles because of someth'n I did.=
  That hurt more than anything else.  Still does, because sooner or later I=
'm gonna have ta do it all over again.  I really don't wanna do that but, i=
f we're gonna get the edge on the cons, it may be up ta me ta put on the pr=
etender routine again.  But this time I'm gonna have ta make it look real. =
 And it might involve me tak'n out one of our own in order ta get back the =
trust of the cons.  I really don't wanna go that route and I hope none of t=
he bosses asks me ta do that.  I dunno if Tucson would ask but I got a funn=
y feel'n that Leo or Rodimus might.  I hope it doesn't turn out that way bu=
t I cant do anything about that."


He sighs.


" If there was a way ta get=
 rid of my Decepticon badge, I'd have it removed in a spark beat."   

Perp=
etually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Jul 28, 2011, at 1:35 AM, Air=
shadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


    
  Nightlight:

  Nig=
htlight said while she looked at the two males "I need the tools to keep 
 =
 safe my family, but I dont know wich ones I need... I never has been a 
  =
warrior..." then she remembered her bitter experience as BlackStorm and wit=
h 
  a bitter tone said "not as Maximal..."

  Elita nodded, she knew that =
her mom was reprogramed as Pred once, but she 
  was much better as Maximal=


  -----Mensaje original----- 
  From: Sandy
  Sent: Wednesday, July 27, 2=
011 8:53 AM
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: Re: MEdic Bay

  Nights=
hift looks over to Nightlight, seeing an opportunity to try his skills 
  a=
t teaching the art of the Ninjabot to Nightlight, which would enhance her 
=
  skill level considerably. It was all about speed, precision, balance, 
  =
discipline, grace, and of course effectiveness.

  He could see potential i=
n her and turns his head in both Nightlight and 
  Bumps direction.

  " Bu=
mp's right, that's somethn' ya gotta learn, but I see a lotta potential 
  =
for train'n ya as a Ninjabot. You got the right moves, mody, and grace, and=
 
  once you're trained, there's gonna be no stopp'n you Nightlight. Master=
 
  Yokitron once said, that a student often shows potential even if they d=
on't 
  realize it themselves. Now, that's totally up to you if ya want the=
 
  training, just see me after we get repaired, and I'll set up a training=
 
  program for ya. Hmm, maybe Rodimus might wanna join in on it too.. It's=
 a 
  perfect opportunity for both of you ta get some extra training under =
your 
  belts."

  He positions himself again.

  " It would really help bo=
th of you out a lot, see'n what Hydras managed ta 
  pull on ya in the past=
. The reason why it didn't work on Tucson or me, is 
  that Master Yokitron=
's training sorta prepared us spiritually for what could 
  come down the p=
ike. Clear minds empty of thoughts are less likely ta get 
  infected by ne=
gative influences, simply because there's no thought energy ta 
  hold onto=
. Clear mind, clear soul, clear spark. Bad stuff just goes in one 
  way, a=
nd out the other. You guys had a lot on your minds when Hydras took 
  you.=
 And that couldn't be helped, but now it can be. I bet my spark plugs 
  th=
at if you and Rodimus train with me, I can get both of ya up ta our level 
=
  and that'll make you a pair of the strongest Autobots this side of the 
 =
 galaxy, but not the type of strength most warriors perceive. This type of =

  strength is the strength of spirit, inner peace, and harmony. A perfect =

  balance between spark, soul, and mind. And yeah, there's a lotta dexteri=
ty 
  aquired in Ninjabot training, the type of dexterity that makes even T=
ucson 
  Prime a bit different then the traditional Autobot Commander. It's=
 a 
  difference Hydras has no inclination how ta fend off. THAT'S the dire=
ction 
  Tucson is gonna take, and if you guys were trained in our art, so =
more power 
  to ya."

  He then looks to Bump, as the repair bench does it=
s job to repair the 
  internal damages done to him.

  " Speakn' of perfor=
mance, that reminds me... I need new hydraulic shock 
  absorbers, timing b=
elt, and I know my struts need work, new tires, body 
  work, and Ty Rods f=
ixed. Oh yeah, need a new front and back end alignment 
  too."

  To repai=
r the damgages to his alt form, he now transforms into his vehicle 
  mode,=
 to prepare for the rest of his repairs. He also notices a busted 
  headli=
ght on the left side.

  "Scrap, throw in a new headlight for the left side=
, new bumpers, front, 
  back, side, and awww slag, transmission's actn' up=
. Probably because I 
  smacked that tree real hard in alt form. After this=
 is all done, I am so 
  gonna give those preds the bill, literally. In oth=
er words, I need a total 
  overhaul ta my alt form. And if you can help it=
, I'd like ta hold onta this 
  one for a while."

  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
  >
  > > <OLD>
  > >
  =
> > Nightlight Stood up And leave her daughter in the bed, she smiled and 
=
  > > said
  > > to her daughter "I be righ back in no time, just remain he=
re"
  > >
  > > "Yes Mommie"said happily Elita
  > >
  > > Nightlight smile=
d and she walked toward the interior of the cr, she 
  > > looked
  > > to =
Bump and said "I'm ready, could you add any defensive skills that I 
  > > =
may
  > > need?? please"
  >
  > <NEW>
  >
  > BUMP looked at NIGHTLIGHT qu=
izzically, "What do you mean?" He
  > manipulated a few controls on his scr=
een. "If you are looking for a
  > specific ability, I can see what I can d=
o, but as far as skills, that
  > is something you learn. I can't make you =
a sharp shooter or a lock
  > pick. I can only give you the tools you need =
to make that happen. You
  > will have to practice to get good at it."
  >
=
  > (TAG)
  >
  > Preston

hoo! Groups Links
